Name: zho-anonymousgroupo-lad
Author: Anonymous Group Of Translators
Source: Goodword Books , http://www.goodwordbooks.com/ , Center for Peace and Spirituality , https://www.cpsglobal.org/

Translations.Text: shì yǐ hēiyè, dāng qí jìjìng de shíhòu
nǐ de zhǔ méiyǒu qì jué nǐ, yě méiyǒu yuànhèn nǐ
hòushì yú nǐ, què bǐ jīnshì gèng hǎo
nǐ de zhǔ jiàng lái bì shǎngcì nǐ, yǐzhì nǐ xǐyuè
Nándào tā méiyǒu fāxiàn nǐ língdīng gūkǔ, ér shǐ nǐ yǒu suǒ guīsù
Tā céng fāxiàn nǐ páihuái qítú, ér bǎ nǐ yǐnrù zhènglù
tā céng fāxiàn nǐ jiājìng hánkǔ, ér shǐ nǐ yīshí fēngzú
Zhìyú gū'ér, nǐ bùyào yāpò tā
zhìyú qǐgài, nǐ bùyào hē chì tā
Zhìyú nǐ de zhǔ suǒ cì nǐ de ēndiǎn ne, nǐ yīngdāng xuānshì tā.§
